text: Punk (stylized in all caps) is the second studio album by Japanese band Chai. The album was released on February 13, 2019 by Otemoyan Records. It was released on March 15, 2019 in North America and Europe by Burger Records and Heavenly Recordings, respectively. ==Accolades== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Publication ! Accolade ! Rank ! class="unsortable"| |- | Noisey | Top 100 Albums of 2019 | | |- | Pitchfork | Top 50 Albums of 2019 | | {{center| |- | Thrillist | Top 35 Albums of 2019 | | |} ==Track listing== ==Personnel== Chai * Kana - Guitar, vocals * Mana - Keyboards, lead vocals * Yuuki - Bass guitar * Yuna - Drums ==Charts== {|class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="text-align:center;" border="1" !scope="col"| Chart (2019) !scope="col"| Peak position |- |- ! scope="row"| Japanese Hot Albums (Billboard Japan) | 72 |- |} ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Chai albums Category:Heavenly Recordings albums
